events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately as this is very frustrating.
The case has been categorized as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Emily Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund faster.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo showing the item I received, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the money back on your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear information. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please contact us if you have any more questions or need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you face any other issues. Thank you for contacting support!
